pages.text: ane tene dharatimam parvato jakadi didha che, jethi te hali na sake ane nahero ane marga pana banavya, jethi tame potani manjila sudhi pahonci sako
biji ghani nisani'o nakki kari ane tara'o dvara pana loko marga melave che
to sum te-je sarjana kare che, tena jevo ho'i sake che je sarjana nathi kari sakato? Sum tame saheja pana vicara nathi karata
ane jo tame allahani ne'amatone ganava mango to tene nathi gani sakata, ni:Sanka allaha ghano ja mapha karanara, dayalu che
ane je kami pana tame chupavo ane jahera karo allaha ta'ala badhum ja jane che
ane jene pana a loko allaha ta'alane chodine pokare che, te ko'i vastunum sarjana nathi kari sakata, parantu temanum sarjana karavamam avyum che
(te'o) mrtako che, jivita nathi, temane to e pana khabara nathi ke kyare temane jagadavamam avase
tamara sauno pujya phakata allaha ta'ala ekalo che ane akherata (paraloka) na divasa para imana na dharavanara'onum dila juthalavanarum che. Ane te pote ahankarathi bharela che
ni:Sanka allaha ta'ala te dareka vastune, jene te loko chupave che ane jene jahera kare che, khuba sari rite jane che, te ahankari lokone pasanda nathi karato
temane jyare puchavamam ave che ke tamara palanahare sum avatarita karyum che? Tyare te'o javaba ape che ke agalana lokoni varta'o che

Anum ja parinama hase ke kayamatana divase a loko potana sampurna bhara sathe temana bharana pana bhagidara hase jemane te'o potani ajnanata dvara pathabhrasta karata rahya, ju'o to ketalo kharaba bhara upavi rahya che

temanathi pahelana loko'e pana yukti kari hati, (chevate) allaha'e (temani yukti'o)ne mula manthi ja kapi nakhi ane temana (matha) para chata uparathi padi ga'i ane temani pase yatana tyanthi avi pahonci je jagya vise te loko vicari sakata pana nahata
